title: Lighting
fullText:
For requirements for lighting to be installed in battery rooms refer to the requirements for the location of luminaires in AS 3011.1 or AS 3011.2.
Luminaires shall not be installed within 200 mm of any battery. Where the battery enclosure is a walk-in room or area, all luminaires shall be installed above the middle of aisles and at a minimum distance of 200 mm from any part of a battery. Luminaires shall not be installed directly over a cell or an exposed live part.
